channel.title: Projects on Raghav Mittal
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Raghav Mittal

item.title: BF Thermal State Index
item.description: Mentor: Dr. Saikat Chatterjee and Dr. Anand Senguttavan, Dastur Energy & Process Metallurgy Stretch: Oct’19 - Feb’20 A dynamic model has been developed for online assessment of the thermal state of a Blast Furnace. Advanced statistical techniques such as Canonical Correlation, Principal Component Analysis, and Bootstrapping were used for analyzing a dataset from an Integrated Steel Plant. The idea was to come up with a tool to assist operators in ensuring better thermal stability of a Blast Furnace.

item.title: Predictive Model for Ladle Desulfurization leveraging ML
item.description: Developed a predictive model for minimizing Ladle Desulfurization cycle time and associated costs

item.title: Adhesion Enhancement of Conductive Inks
item.description: Performed experiments to enhance adhesion of conductive inks on non-porous substrates for printing application

item.title: Ladle Circuit Optimization
item.description: Ladle circuit optimization through simulations for reduced refractory wear, energy consumption and carbon emissions

item.title: Predictive Tundish Open Eye Model
item.description: Developed a predictive tundish open eye (TOE) model using artificial neural networks
